description:
Tango - Free Text, Voice, Video & Calling App


Tango is a free messenger service that allows you to connect, get social and have fun with those who matter most to you. Send free text messages, make free video & voice phone calls, share photos, meet new friends, play games, search music from Spotify & more! 

Join millions of people around the world using Tango as their #1 messaging app & new mobile social network.  Tango voice and video calls work great whether you connect with 3G, 4G or Wi-Fi.  Play against friends in dozens of Tango games and share your favorite songs powered by Spotify.  You can find your favorite videos by searching Tango channel categories like news, entertainment, sports and more.  

Free calling & free texting
- Video calling, voice calling & text messages are free locally & globally
- Calls & messaging work just like they do on your phone
- Messenger & call services don’t use your minutes or SMS plan
- Easily find friends on Tango

Connect with friends
- High quality video calling, voice calling & messages
- 1 to 1 chat & group texting with up to 300 friends
- Works across most smartphones, tablets, & PCs 
- Great quality voice & video calling on 3G, 4G, & Wi-Fi

Get social 
- Personalize your profile with status updates & photos
- Send Tango stickers in messages and comments
- Edit, share, comment & like photos 
- Post status, pics, videos, music clips, links, audio messages, stickers and animated surprises to the news feed
- Easily find friends nearby or anywhere in the world
- Connect with friends of friends in “People You May Know”

Have fun with Tango
- Browse channels in different categories, including entertainment, sports, music, lifestyle, and news
- Follow your favorite brands or publishers to find and share fun videos, photos, links, and more 
- Challenge friends, send gifts, & climb leaderboards in 40+ featured games on Tango
- Discover, listen & share songs powered by Spotify 
- Personalize your calls & messages with fun animations and stickers 
- Play a mini-game or share photos during a call 

Awards
- Best Communication App – 2013 Appy Awards 
- Best Texting App – 2013 About.com Reader’s Choice Awards 
- Must Have Apps List – 2013 Verizon Wireless

Tango is the only app you need to be social and stay connected to the people who matter most.  With plenty of awesome features and tons of entertainment, Tango is your one stop app for fun and free socializing.  Download Tango today!  

For any questions or feedback, reach out to us at: http://support.tango.me

To learn more about the awesome free calling and messaging app Tango, visit us at at http://www.tango.me 

Follow us on:
Facebook at http://facebook.com/TangoMe 
Twitter at http://twitter.com/TangoMe 
Google+ at google.com/+tangoapp
LinkedIn at http://www.linkedin.com/company/tango-me


Interested in expanding your social network?  Try Tango’s Premium Discovery subscription, which lets you chat with the most popular people on Tango. 

Premium Discovery Subscription
- Available for $9.99 per month
- Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, & identify the cost of the renewal
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user & auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.
- For more information see Tango’s Privacy Policy at http://www.tango.me/privacy-policy & Tango’s Terms of Use at http://www.tango.me/terms-of-use
